name: Cheese and Wine
description:
Small shooter game I made for the Wine Game Jam 2018

Features:

  • 4 types of cheese
  • 4 types of weapons
  • 2 powerups

Click to shoot cheese and powerups that appear on the screen.

Press R to reload. 

G to throw a wine glass.

Remember to drink responsibly!

Warning: those susceptible to motion sickness may want to give this one a pass, sorry!
